Value: Summon three spirits to aid the Brewmaster. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Three strong spirits, 45 seconds cooldown. |n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Three powerful spirits, 30 seconds cooldown. |n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Three incredibly powerful spirits, 15 seconds cooldown.
